name: THE GEO GROUP
description: The GEO Group provides housing, re-entry and rehabilitation services
sampleDescriptions: GEO's political and governmental relations activities focus on promoting the use of public-private partnerships in the delivery of correctional services including evidence-based rehabilitation program
